description:
Many of you may already know that I’m a foot fetishist. I love and adore everything about feet and have recently launched a new site at Kink.com called FootWorship.com! I know that many of you are as much of a foot freak as I am and as a thanks to all of you I’m giving you a taste of all the foot worship, foot licking, trampling, beautiful toes, high arches and wet kinky foot jobs that you can see over there as a bonus! It’s the full movie so enjoy and if you yourself want to worship feet as much as I do then I’ll see you over there!

John Jammen is a clumsy bellhop who’s seduced by Maitresse Madeline a beautiful woman staying in the hotel and is made to worship, lick, clean, suck and smell her gorgeous heels, stockings and feet. He’s rewarded with a oily kinky foot job and made to lick them clean!

For the love of feet, M.M.~
title: BONUS FOOT FETISH FEATURE! From FootWorship.com!
